run() - Method in class coupon.sys.core.sub.processes.DailyCouponExpirationTask
In order to delete all the old coupons: 1.1 get all the coupons from the DB as a collection 1.2 check whether the end date of the coupon is less then current date in case yes 1.3 activate the remove coupon method in the CouponDaoDb class
